== Main Inclusion Report for gfxboot-theme-ubuntu ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~cjwatson/bzr/gfxboot-themes/Ubuntu/]]</nowiki>; in NEW queue
# ''Rationale:''
** Implementation of CdBootloader specification.
 0. ''Security:''
** New package; no security history.
** Runs in the context of the boot loader, although with only those functions provided by gfxboot.
** Just data, no executable bits.
** No theoretical attack vectors; if people can boot a CD, they have full control about the box anyway.
# ''Quality assurance:''
# ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** <nowiki>[[MainInclusionReportGfxboot|gfxboot]]</nowiki>
